entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence we heard from @realDonaldTrump in Tulsa that the “slowing” of COVID-19 is the result of this administration slowing the test therefore under reporting the actual results and putting more Americans in danger. #TrumpLiesPeopleDie #BunkerBoy #WaterDrinkingChallenge
